qas.question: What date was independence considered universal?
What event caused the recognition to be universal?
Where did a coup take place?
Who was overthrown in the coup?

context: Independence was unilaterally declared on <a0_0>24 September 1973<a0_0/>. Recognition became universal following the <a1_0>25 April 1974<a1_0/> <a2_0>socialist-inspired military coup<a2_0/> in <a3_0>Portugal<a3_0/>, which overthrew <a4_0>Lisbon's Estado Novo regime<a4_0/>.
